participants.name: Chase McVey
participants.description: Section Lecturer at The Ohio State University
participants.url: Former Graduate Teaching Associate at The Ohio State University

messages.message:
Linda
Hey there, I think Chase might be coming home this weekend, so I would like to send the costco run back with him because I have a big party next Friday night before we see you all for Family Weekend and it would be easier for us to take care of this earlier.  Also, if I send back stuff for cheese potatoes for the party at Pam's could you all manage to get those made and to her house before the game?  Send me the list.

Chase
I am going home this weekend, I'll probably leave right after marching band tomorrow.

Facebook User
We need:
Ravioli
Salmon
Burgers
Potstickers
Salt
Olive Oil
Spaghetti 
Spaghetti Sauce
Kleenex
Paper towels
